strings.string: [B]Controls[/B][CR]- Focus tile: MOUSE-HOVER, UP, RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN[CR]- Turn focused tile clockwise: RIGHTCLICK, ESC, BACK[CR]- Turn focused tile counter-clockwise: LEFTCLICK, ENTER[CR]- Lock focused tile: MIDDLECLICK, INFO, SPACE[CR]- Exit Game: STOP, EXIT-BUTTON[CR]
[B]Goal[/B][CR]Your goal is to connect all terminals to the server by rotating the tiles[CR]Note, there is only ONE solution possible for each game!
